amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for State and Tribal Assistance Grants by $861 million; $432 million for capitalization grants for the Clean Water State Revolving Funds and $429 million for capitalization grants for the Drinking Water State Revolving Funds.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the McNerney amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. McNerney.
